lenders.name: Tony

lenders.occupational_info: I recycle paper and Cardboard and run a farm raising sheep and cattle

lenders.name: Alain
lenders.loan_because: God is with me when I am with them.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: it's important for people to have something to work towards instead of a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach my child at home instead of in a formal school.  We learn the basics out of workbooks but otherwise, do life learning.

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can!

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: Kylie and I seek to assist those less fortunate then ourselves through investing in micro businesses to help improve sustainability, society and economic growth in less developed countries.

lenders.name: Marcus
lenders.loan_because: Donating through Kiva allows me to see exactly how my money has helped someone improve their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for The Royal British Legion, providing health and safety advice across the South West region of England.

lenders.name: Rene
lenders.loan_because:
It is my solemn belief that the answer to man’s eternal question, “why am I here?” Has always been, to serve your fellow man.

Here is a fabulous way to do so, through Kiva.org. Let’s empower people by sharing the wealth!

lenders.name: Janne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people to help themselves

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I am very blessed and would like to help others achieve their goals and dreams. Through this organization I find that sometimes it is simply helping someone maintain a simple sense of pride in taking care of their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer to take people out of reality for a few hours and into a world where anything can happen.

lenders.name: Mag
lenders.loan_because: I have and they need...

lenders.name: Ron Koch
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help people create businsess and sustain themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help build software that banks use to analyze their customer and lending information.

lenders.name: The optimist
lenders.loan_because: With the hope that by lending a hand it helps others to extend a hand to someone else and brings humans closer to one another.

lenders.name: Mimi
lenders.loan_because: of the butterfly effect of Kiva. A tiny donation can make a big difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell residential real estate in Raleigh, NC - USA.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: in an ideal world we would readily give to each other but a loan is also a relationship, a give and take, a recogniton of each other.

lenders.name: Esther
lenders.loan_because: I believe microfinancing the way KIVA does is the only way to responsibilise people for their lives.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I am my brother's keeper

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.occupational_info: I entertain on television and movies.

lenders.name: Charlotte
lenders.loan_because: i'm trying to make a difference...
lenders.occupational_info: guiding/traveling/tour-operator/events

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because: Just one drop of water could be the start of a waterfall....
lenders.occupational_info: I train and offer study support services to health care professionals conducting clinical research.

lenders.name: mirav
lenders.loan_because:
I know Microfinancing works!!!  Did a story about the "women's World Bank" and learned a lot about microfinance and how it works. I also went on study tour with the Heifer Project, (they loan cattle) and saw the success with my own eyes.
I think KIVA is a brilliant idea!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I help make TV stories by putting sounds together with pictures to tell a story.

lenders.name: Dorie
lenders.loan_because: I travel all over the world and am always looking for true and valuable ways to help the local people I meet.  This is a fantastic opportunity!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach in a primary school, currently teaching 4/5 year old boys and girls.

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: Together, we can help others to become successful and empowered. There is joy in finding ways to help others.

lenders.name: Texas Girl
lenders.loan_because: I want to share and to extend peace to another human being.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large company that provides business services to others.

lenders.name: joanie
lenders.loan_because: Love seeing people able to work for themselves.

lenders.name: ITM
lenders.loan_because: Our team wants to forge corporate citizenship and stimulate the entrepreneural spirit to drive individuals out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Our team of international treasury consultants helps clients across the US mitigate risk by establishing efficient treasury structures.

lenders.name: Stewart
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired and fascinated by entrepreneurs where ever they are in the world. Kiva allows me to support those in countries that don't offer entrepreneurs the same opportunities that we have here.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage projects that improve the way the organisation's I work for operate.

lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I want to share and to be a light to those who are in need.  I want to make more than a difference!

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand sometimes!

lenders.name: Seamane
lenders.loan_because: These are people trying to do better for themselves and those around them. If I can help even a little bit, why wouldn't I? We all should. I admire all of these people and wish them great success.
lenders.occupational_info: I take things that people have written (books, essays, letters, etc.) and make them read more clearly and correctly.

lenders.name: Karen & Keilee
lenders.loan_because:
we care....
and even though it isn't as much as we would like, it is enough to make a difference.

<3
K&K
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a single mom who homeschools my 8 year old daughter.

I work from home for a trailer rental company for Cast and Crew in the entertainment industry.

lenders.name: Don Hyndman
lenders.loan_because: My garden is in full bloom.My puppy Libby and i would like to share it  while your garden is still growing.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: it makes a real difference in people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I focus on art that has been put up on the street for free.

lenders.name: Dennis & Hilda
lenders.loan_because: I like to promote others in achieving their goals.

lenders.name: Jennifer and Todd
lenders.loan_because: we can and we should.

lenders.name: Heber
lenders.loan_because:
There are a number of reasons why I lend :

The first and most important is simply because I feel that anyone who has been blessed as much as I owes an obligation to God and to society.

By providing financing whether for seed capital, expansion projects, or operating expenses we can help an ambitious entrepreneur make ends meet, while enhancing rather than diminishing his/her dignity.  Having lived over 85% of my live in less developed countries I have noticed that the least privileged are much more ambitious and innovative than many assume.

By providing some small assistance to help the less privileged achieve their goals through the context of individual strengths, insights, and dreams we can forestall the need for them to fall back on the already bloated and inefficient central government social mechanisms.  

Rather than give a man a fish or teach him how to fish, Kiva.org lets us finance his/her ambition and first hand knowledge of the local community.

I also lend because it is kind of fun to manage a loan portfolio.  Besides helping others in need I like to try my hand at loan selection and try to maintain a healthy portfolio.
lenders.occupational_info: Married with 3 children.  Wish I could do more to help people rise to a higher level.

lenders.name: Ed, M.E. and John
lenders.occupation: We are 3 people: Priest, Minister, cabinetmaker
lenders.loan_because: Instead of paying Ed for spiritual direction, we use those monies to help those less fortunate.  We believe that Christ has called us to share our resources with the poor, and kiva is a great way to empower people to help themselves.  We are proponents of microlending and other avenues of socially responsible investing, and are glad to be a part of kiva.org.
lenders.occupational_info:
-Ed is a priest & teacher, and spiritual director for M.E. 
-M.E. does ministry on a college campus.  
-John (M.E.'s husband) is a cabinetmaker and engineer.

lenders.name: siobhan
lenders.loan_because: I admire these people and their spirit of entrepreneurship.

lenders.name: MICHAEL & CYNTHIA
lenders.loan_because: WHEN WE'VE NEEDED HELP ~ OTHERS HAVE ALWAYS BEEN THERE TO ASSIST AND I WOULD LIKE TO PASS ON THE BLESSING ~
lenders.occupational_info:
MICHAEL / ELECTRICIAN - CONSTRUCTION AND REPAIRS TO ELECTRICAL SYSTEM'S. 
CYNTHIA / DENTAL / OFFICE MANAGER

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: It is each of our responsibility to take care of our fellow human beings.  I am fortunate to have enough resources where I can afford to share with others needing a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to be effective advocates for their needs, and how to participate in the political process.  I work to strengthen democracy in my country.

lenders.name: Mrs. Moore
lenders.loan_because: We loan in order to learn about microeconomics and how one small investment can make a big difference for an entrpreneur.  We like knowing that even as 13 and 14 year olds we can help change people's lives for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 8th grade social studies in Alpharetta, GA, USA.  We are learning about our home state of Georgia and how we can become involved in the global market place.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I was introduced to Kiva by a wonderful person.  I looked into Kiva and found it to be a worthy cause.
lenders.occupational_info: I use to work with computers.  It was very challenging.

lenders.name: Susanne & Chris
lenders.loan_because: We know that a little jump start can make a big difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: To receive God's blessings, you must be willing to give.

lenders.name: Christine&Jessica
lenders.loan_because: we can, and we care.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I've been given opportunities that changed my life, so I want to help provide opportunities to others.

lenders.name: Rohan
lenders.loan_because: I like to make people smile.
lenders.occupational_info: I have to clap, smile and give kisses and hugs on command. In addition, I have to constantly engage in interesting activities in order to keep my family amused. It's a rough life.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to be self employed and how much a little support can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I design bookstore graphics and am a quilter. I'm also learning AutoCAD.

lenders.name: Vivien
lenders.loan_because: Caring & sharing is a better way to achieve world peace than killing & destroying.  So glad I can help.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: Because I think it is a great way to help people help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the example of Jesus. Hopefully, small acts of love are multiplied and change the world in a positive way.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital and help people with breathing problems or lung injuries.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I sponsor 7 children in Uulaanbatar through the Christina Noble Children's Foundation, have visited them twice.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I have borrowed money to accomplish my goals, and it gives me great pleasure to be able now to loan money so that others can accomplish their goals.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am retired from teaching and from other endeavours during my working years.  I spend my time with my partner and my dogs in a wonderful house which we bought with bank loans.  
We love to travel, particularly to Mexico, South America and the South Pacific.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I disagree with my finance teacher; this is what I call interest.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to "pass it on" and help other succeed.

lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping those who help themselves.

lenders.loan_because: I thought it is a nice Idea to help other people around the world take a step out of poverty. A week ago, me and my father Nigel Smith took Jameila a nineteen year old girl with a five month year old son out shopping for equipment and food in her new apartment, and I felt really lucky for what I have.

lenders.name: Nancie
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with the abundance of good health, family and friends.  I have been in situations where a little bit of help would have made all the difference in the world and so I would like to be part of that type of help to others.  I am very excited about helping and hopefully making a difference.  I plan to spread the word to those I come in contact with and to include a link to this site from my web site.  Blessings to all!
lenders.occupational_info: I an Independent Shaklee Products Distributor.  We carry earth friendly products for both personal health and the health of your home.  I am very proud of my association with Shaklee and all the company stands for.  I have a website devoted to women of the Baby Boomer Age.  Helping women with health and wellness, physical and financial body, mind and spirit, is my goal.

lenders.name: KaTinka
lenders.loan_because: We are so fortunate in America to have the opportunity to prosper.  So many people in the world are not as fortunate. It feeds the soul.

lenders.name: Gyan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who help themselves. Hopefully making a (small) difference in improving one, two, three or a few lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Computer (IT) Services department of a bank.

lenders.name: Donald
lenders.loan_because: I know the effectiveness of microenterprise development by prior work I've done in Indonesia and Ukraine.  One person can make a difference in the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in local government building better communities.  My trade is quality of life.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: By quirk of fate . . . I am BLESSED with so MUCH in a world where so MANY have so LITTLE.  It gives life meaning to be engaged in something BIGGER than oneself . . . ;-)
lenders.occupational_info: I am a self-employed furniture maker, husband, father, and grandfather.

lenders.loan_because: Someone is always worse off then the next person
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of mentally handicapped Men. It's a very rewarding job.

lenders.name: Wendolyn

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Pastor in the Lutheran Church (ELCA).  The youth in our confirmation class are cheering on our entrepreneurs!

lenders.loan_because: It is a great way to give back.  My family and I have been helped in many ways, and I want to give back in some way too!
lenders.occupational_info: I stay at home with my children, while my husband provides for our family financially.  I love my work~ I am able to rear my children with love and provide for them a stable environment.  I am so thankful I am able to do this.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs some help at some time and right now I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop computer programs for big oil companies.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I am committed to making the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I help buyers find the things the need and sellers find their customers.

lenders.loan_because: Where there's life, there's hope.  --Cicero

lenders.name: michelle
lenders.loan_because: Its an easy opportunity to make a difference in someone's life.  I also loan on behalf of friends and family and give them a portfolio of that loan for presents!

lenders.name: Anne-Grete
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help people in third world countries to develop their own business so they can become economically independent and improve their lives. With just a little financial help from us, we can make a difference!!! Thanks Kiva.

lenders.name: Mia
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I package and ship goods from our location to locations all over the world.

lenders.name: Tineke
lenders.loan_because: I want to give other people the chance to realise their dreams.

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: I heard about this on Oprah. I decided to provide loans to those in need as a "gift" to my work group (team). Instead of a starbucks or blockbuster gift card, they can enjoy this gift of "giving" to others, which is the true meaning of the season, right?  --- it just felt like the right thing to do. Thanks for giving me the opportuity to chose this ongoing gift for my team.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for AT&T, a large telecommunications company. I am a team lead for the Online group. We manage the att.com website.

lenders.name: Shar
lenders.loan_because: It is a good thing to help others...I know because many people have helped ME! As a global community, we're all connected and must be responsible for each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher of "at risk" youth (students who are on drugs, etc.) in an urban public high school. In addition, I am an author, a lay minister with the United Church of Canada, and a lecturer at a university (educational psychology).

lenders.name: Kevin Zernickow
lenders.loan_because: Anybody who is willing to work to make their life better deserves the opportunity.

lenders.name: Erika & Abbas
lenders.loan_because: O you who have believed, spend from the good things which you have earned and from that which We have produced for you from the earth. And do not aim toward the defective therefrom, spending [from that] while you would not take it [yourself] except with closed eyes. And know that Allah is Free of need and Praiseworthy. 2-267
lenders.occupational_info: Community Service

lenders.occupational_info: Our family members work in a variety of different areas; medicine, computers, construction, sales, railroad, papermills...

lenders.name: Theresa

lenders.name: Mark & Rita

lenders.occupational_info: I work at a Carbon dioxide recovery  plant.  My Wife is a Kitchen Worker at a local middle school .

lenders.name: Alicia

lenders.name: Cristen
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people help themselves and I admire those who have the determination to be an entrepreneur. Plus, it is right to share our good fortune with others.

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: I know one person can make a difference.

lenders.occupational_info: I work in the investment industry

lenders.loan_because: IMF & World Bank are doing a poor job.  The result of lending should be economically successful individuals not economic slaves.

lenders.name: Lydia
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed in life.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: We are all in this world together.  If I can help someone by making his/her life easier - that's what it's all about.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with high school students selecting classes, college planning and day to day situations that may interfere with the learning process.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: Last week we had our first big snow of the season and I took a "snow day!"  I was watching Oprah and she mentioned Kiva.  I was stunned by the stories and how a relatively small amount of money could make a real difference to someone.  Had to check it out!
lenders.occupational_info: We do commercial/industrial and residential water treatment.

lenders.name: Jerry Ostradicky
lenders.loan_because: there is nothing more fulfilling that helping people help themselves get out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I get up to date information on how my my contributions are helping people all over the world.

lenders.loan_because: I feel like helping people is something that is important and it is something that I would like to do in any way possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a high school student. I am fifteen years old and I go to school five days a week and work on the weekends. I'm very involved at school, and am a good student and involved in sports and theatre.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: In honor of my mom, who is pictured, she passed away when she was just 30, and when I was just 5. She was a beautiful loving mom, can't wait till heaven, to hug her.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a kitchen have been since 1976, would love to own my own business one day, but this is a way to help others work there own business and stand proud doing so. I know working in a kitchen is hard work, however it is very rewarding, loving others with the food you make. Please know you are loved around the world. Good luck in all you do.

lenders.name: morgan
lenders.loan_because: i found out about it on the Oprah Show, i love to help people in anyway!!!

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to think you can make a small difference to someone you don't even know.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: Some of these are single parents and that is difficult, I was one.  Also I have wanted to volunteer in some of these countries now that I'm retired and have yet to get there, so if I can give a little to help someone, it makes my heart feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: I now make jewelry (silver, copper, and bronze - metalsmithing) and I also paint on silk fabric for scarves and women's clothing.  I am retired from working for the government.

lenders.name: Colin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people get the opportunity to better their lives
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student, but living in America I have many advantages others don't, and so want to help people around the world in specific ways.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: My brother introduced us to this by giving us a gift certificate.  I love this idea because it seems like it can make a world of difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I direct plays and musicals.  Hopefully my work not only entertains people, but makes them think too.

lenders.name: Joselita
lenders.loan_because: We need to support each other.

lenders.name: Diann
lenders.loan_because: I think this makes a REAL difference in people'slives.

lenders.name: Erica
lenders.loan_because:
kindness in words
creates confidence

kindness in thinking
creates profoundness

kindness in giving
creates love
lenders.occupational_info: editor. producer. --->creative weirdo@ a local tv station.

lenders.name: Raley
lenders.loan_because: I am able to.  People here in the states loan to me, but others don't have that same chance and I can help provide that.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend time with high school students and young people who are in need.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I am currently working through my church with HIV -positive patients in Kenya to start their own businesses.  Kiva allows me another avenue to support small businesses world-wide, just as I received help when I started.
lenders.occupational_info: I investigate the title of real estate prior to purchase to make sure it's clear of potential claims. I then facilitate the closing, record documents and disburse funds to the parties.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.occupation: Riding Mountain National Park Gift Exchange

lenders.name: Jamie Lynn
lenders.loan_because:
My husband and I are grateful for the lives we lead; I want everyone to have an opportunity to feel this level of gratitude for themselves. As human beings, I believe we have an inherent need to share, help, and rely on one another in local & global communities. 

However, having a BS in Environmental Science, I am unwilling to loan to those who use unsound environmental practices, such as the use of herbicides, pesticides, or extensive monocultures that lead to soil depletion and the need for purchasing fertilizers.
lenders.occupational_info: I purchase and sell products for an independent, locally-owned health food market. We pride ourselves on selecting organic, sustainable, handmade, and locally-grown products to offer to our community.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy making change possible, on whatever scale
lenders.occupational_info: FT peace professional through practice of Transcendental Meditation in groups

lenders.name: sivu
lenders.loan_because: Because i want to help people around the world to get ahead.

lenders.name: wendy
lenders.occupational_info: I am a customer service rep at a high tech company

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: This seems like a great way to lend a helping hand.

lenders.name: Lysbeth
lenders.loan_because: Jesus provides for me, so that I may bless others.

lenders.name: Lorie
lenders.loan_because: I love the concept that 100% of the money that I loan goes directly to the borrower and that for them, it could be life changing.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do! I love the fact that you can make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Auto Sales

lenders.name: Gwen Knox
lenders.loan_because: I believe in paying forward.
lenders.occupational_info: Retiree

lenders.name: Merijn
lenders.loan_because: It's helping these people become selfsufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: At the moment, I spend my time drawing educational material.

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: In order to be successful, people need someone to believe in them and give them a chance.  I want to let someone know that I believe in them.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help get safe and effective medicines to treat cancer approved by government agencies throughout the world.

lenders.name: Cristalle
lenders.occupation: Community Outreach and Government Affairs Manager
lenders.loan_because: one person can make a difference if they try.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an association of people in real estate.  We have over ten thousand members in our local area.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we are one world and one people. It is my hope that these loans will in some small way help to make this world a better place. Thanks to Kiva for giving me this opportunity to participate.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an electronics  technician and computer network technician. I am also an artist and musician and enjoy producing my own electronic music.

lenders.name: Margy
lenders.loan_because: I try to: "Live simply. Give more. Expect less."

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.occupational_info: I help keep workers safe.

lenders.name: Kristina
lenders.loan_because: Tzedaka

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: I have all that I need, and more.  Many others are not so fortunate.  The people asking for loans work hard and deserve a chance to improve their lives and the lives of their families.  Making a small loan to them is the least I can do.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: Giving money is a rewarding form of investment.  I use KIVA to express my donor activism. I encourage others to be thoughtful in their giving and to be as generous as possible.  Sharing and helping others to reach their dreams allows my footprint on Earth to last longer than my physical presence.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: I believe that........ "to much is given, much is required."
lenders.occupational_info: Believing in, working toward and imagining a world of educational access and equity!

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I believe that if we all helped eachother the world would be a better place!

lenders.name: Tina
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their goals and provide for their families.

lenders.name: Carol Lee
lenders.loan_because: My loan was actually a gift from my sister in law.  This was a fabulous idea.
lenders.occupational_info: For the past 3 decades, I have worked as a nurse and an educator of nursing students.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: It feels so good to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a volunteer child, family, and community advocate.

lenders.name: Abe

lenders.name: Mary and Beans
lenders.occupation: Mom and daughter, Sign Language Interpreter
lenders.loan_because: My 14 yr old daughter and I choose several ways to 'sponsor' local families every yr during the holidays. Over the past 13 yrs we've given goats, fresh water or wells, vet kits and now Kiva loans.  My daughter's answer to "Why we loan?" is "Because we like to."  My answer is "Why not?"  Kiva is the BEST idea ever!  You guys are brilliant!  Thank you for allowing us to tag on to your bettering the world, one loan at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sign language interpreter for Deaf people, bridging communication gaps between people who can and can't sign.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I like people! We want to be able to give back to the world in a way that helps someone else acheive a good life!  I am also working on starting my own golf clothing line. See the photo!
lenders.occupational_info: Different all the time!

lenders.loan_because: I am realizing more and more how disconnected our world is.  I want to be a part of connecting with people all over the world and giving is an easy way to do that.
lenders.occupational_info: I recruit, organize, and train volunteers to work in public schools to help improve students' reading skills.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I love the KIVA premise, and the borrowers/entrepreneurs that it allows to develop and hopefully prosper. I feel priveliged to be a lender.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to find the best people available and train them in my business, paying fairly but promising them that I will prepare them for a better future with my company or some other if they choose, if they work hard, are honest and reliable and willing to learn. I have always kept my word with my employees. Overall ,I am a business woman that believes in ethics, morality & hard work. I also believe in what I call the trinity of business; your employees, your customers and your vendors / suppliers. If you are fair and loyal to all three I believe that you will almost always succeed.

lenders.name: Randi
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to have the money to help others, which makes me feel great!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to get government benefits that are meant to help poor people:  cash, medical care and food.  Sometimes it is very hard to get the benefits and a lawyer is needed.  It is a great job and I love it.

lenders.name: Lynda
lenders.loan_because: I am a member of the world community, I unite with others in faith and love. I love to help facilitate unity and hope. I am open to giving and receiving.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a healer of the body and soul. I help facilitate in helping people find their divine potential.

lenders.loan_because: We see the difference that such a loan can make in self esteem and self worth.  We feel it important for all peoples to see the fruits of their ard work.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of students who are learning about economic struggles through out the world, and are glad to be apart of such a wonderful and obviously significant aid to those who just need a little extra help.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lenders.name: Agnieszka
lenders.loan_because: I am a believer in the entrepreneurial spirit...and that spirit needs money!

lenders.loan_because: Christ Jesus commanded us to love one another and this is one way to show His love to the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help translate the confusion of law to regular language.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Keeping the environment clean and taking care of my kids.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: “Do not be daunted by the enormity of the world’s grief. Do justly now. Love mercy, now. Walk humbly, now. You are not obligated to complete the work, but neither are you free to abandon it.”
lenders.occupational_info: I am a college soccer coach.

lenders.name: Team Best
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans are the most efficient in changing lives of determined people.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a French Immertion high school in Coquitlam Canada

lenders.name: Randy
lenders.loan_because: It feels nice to actually be able to help, even if you can only give a little you can help a lot.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: We all have a responsibility to each other, to reach across our borders, beyond our horizons and to hold out a helping hand to a neighbor that we have yet to meet.
lenders.occupational_info: Emotional Well-being Facilitator, I work with Australian Bush Flower Essences, the Emotional Freedom Technique (EFT) and channel energy (hands on healing) to relieve emotional and physical dis-ease.

lenders.name: Kelli
lenders.loan_because: I once got really lost when I was traveling in Kathmandu in Nepal.  A young girl working at a market could see I was a little upset and offered to help.  She got me a taxi and helped me find my way back to my hotel.  Along the way she told me about her family and how they were working to save for her to go to school. When we got to where I needed to be, I offered her some money.  She refused it outright and said that she was sure I would do the same for her if she was in the US.  Her generosity was amazing and touching.  Its time to give back!
lenders.occupational_info: Lawyer that represents public schools and teachers.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Paying It Forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a hospice volunteer manager. I recruit, train, educate, support and supervise volunteers who sit with the dying. Hospice volunteers are amazing and wonderful people. They give of themselves without expecting reward. They do difficult work, giving support to people who are dying. We should all take lessons from THEM. Also I am a Reiki Master Healer. I send the people asking for loans on this site Love and Light.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe people can achieve their goals if given the chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in New York City, working with mortgages.  I moved here 3 years ago from a rural area four hours away, and I love living in NYC.

lenders.occupational_info: Retired. As a woman who worked in a "mans" area of employment I refer to myself as a "pink" collar worker.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I realize how lucky I am to have always had help when I needed it and want to let others feel that support.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It is nice to see someone improve their situation. Everyone should have opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to improve their English so that they can communicate with foreigners.

lenders.loan_because: in the words of the great Dr. Seuss, "UNLESS someone like you cares a whole awful lot, nothing is going to get better. It's not."
lenders.occupational_info: I assist little children and beginners getting on and off a snow ski lift. I also teach adaptive skiing in my spare time.

lenders.loan_because:
one person can make a difference...
one step at a time.

lenders.loan_because: Everyone can make a difference in the world.... no matter how small and it's fun!!!

lenders.loan_because:
The boldness to believe that our business can change the world both locally and globally.  

We choose to live in gratitude of the abundance we have been given and commit to sharing that with others.

lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to become a teacher and I also work part time on a farm.

lenders.occupational_info: Having my own business I understand the challenges. Always keep your head up, smile and know with You Can Do It!

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I want to improve the lives of my fellow human beings.

lenders.name: Christion Peterman
lenders.loan_because: Nothing brings more joy than helping people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Inspired to effect change in someone's life.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.occupation: Single Mother & Small home business owner
lenders.loan_because: We all need help once in a while.  Today I am blessed with good health and good prospects and I am in a position to help in a small way.  I live in the best country in the world and I like to help those with the spirit to try and make their lives better.  I admire the tenacity and ingenuity evident in the many faces I see on KIVA.  They are inspiring.  The lenders too are inspiring, varied as the applicants it is a joy to be a part of this great organisation.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am taking a nursing refresher course at the moment.  Something we have to do if we have not practices for more than six years.  Although I did work overseas it was casual and not enough to count so it was back to the books fo me.  Not a bad thing but just a slow process. Sometimes I feel like I will never get through it.  I had fully expected to have to pay for my studies but I was lucky to be  granted the entire cost by our provincial government in Alberta.  There are not many people who have this privilege. I look at some of the people on KIVA and know that but for my privilege of birth and circumstance I too could be in their situation.
I do a little volunteering in the arts here in the city.

lenders.name: Sandra, Pam and Debbi
lenders.loan_because: thru here we are able to help, where otherwise we could not.
lenders.occupational_info: Administration and Social Secretaries!

lenders.name: BENJAMIN KARIUKI WAWERU
lenders.loan_because:
Dear kiva, 
I am realy intrested having a lone towards your micro-finance ,i run a hostel that has accapacity of 65 students i cook for them breakfast,lunch and supper the food cost is quiet high hear in kenya i need to buy my dry goods in bulk so that i can cut down my food cost ever month/my rent fee .All in all i need about $2500 loan repaid back. 

yours faithfully;
Benjamin kariuki waweru,
cell 0726757164
thank you sir/madam
lenders.occupational_info:
i run a Hostel for catering university students hear in nakuru county/KENYA .
The hostels name is called Joy hostel we offer;
1.Rooms
2.Security
3.Water
4.Cleanliness
5.Meals
6.Entertainment

lenders.name: Harry
lenders.loan_because:
With redistributing a bit of wealth to people who really need it, the world will be a better place.

Currently I am using our 'for benefit company FlexiWay Solar to help alleviate poverty by replacing dangerous, toxic and expensive kerosene lamps by our solar-powered LED lights, see http://flexiwaysolar.com.

Before I have cycled from Alaska to Argentina, see http://WorldOnaBike.com for images and reports.

My website  www.ExposedPlanet.com is a so-called photoblog, which is the visual variation of a blog. 

I have started ExposedPlanet.com not only as a way to show my portfolio, but also to share the beauty of our planet and its people. Nowadays negative press & media might make people scared of everything foreign or different: culture, religion, people and the places themselves. This xenophobia is taking over our lives and prevents us from seeing the real world as it is: a wonderful place with beautiful people. 

There are no bad or evil countries, religions or people. There is bad and good people in every culture, including your own.

I hope I can share a bit of the amazement I have enjoyed while traveling the 7 continents. The more I see, the more I know I still have to see and I will. Life is too short to focus on not-existing enemies & fears. 

I also started  www.biketravellers.com, where cyclists can open a weblog. If more people use their bicycle, the earth will e a bit greener, and as we will be less dependent on oil, safer too...
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a photographer, writer and organizer of mountain climbing expeditions. I have had the luck to travel on all continents and meet people all over the world.

Much time I spent behind my computer, creating my websites, answering emails and organizing logistics, writing and editing photograps. The rest of the time, I am travelling, either for work or out of curiosity or for the experience of travelling on a bicycle :)

lenders.name: ivan
lenders.loan_because: To Help
lenders.occupational_info: Bathroom Accessories

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: I can afford to
lenders.occupational_info: I have work at the moment

lenders.name: Boyana
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to create a better future for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research on how businesses collaborate to improve the efficiency and quality of their products.

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: I work in musical theater in the Netherlands, creating musicals as either the director, the choreographer or both.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: A loan gives a person more self respect and incentive than a gift.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: Someone, somewhere can always use help with something.....

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: God calls us to care for the sick, the poor and those in prison.
lenders.occupational_info: I stay home with my two kids and raise them in a way that will glorify God!  I support my husband so he can also glorify God through his job!  I take care of our home.

lenders.name: Mandy
lenders.loan_because: I was blessed in this life with a wonderful family and everything a person could ever need.  We are all one people on this earth and it is our responsibility to share with others the wealth that we have been blessed with.

lenders.name: katherine
lenders.loan_because: This is one of those perfect ideas, I am honored to participate.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a professional cook.

lenders.name: Mimi
lenders.loan_because:
As a citizen of the world who lives in a developed country I strongly believe we all owe it to help our fellow human beings who unfairly, through mere circumstance get by with so much less ... 

Capitalism, Imperialism together with religious dogma has held back humanity, science and progress for far too long.  We can and must reverse this trend and increase equity around the world, as without this humanity will continue to be plagued by poverty and injustice.  Let's get back to our intrinsic humanistic principles and create a world in which all humans have equal universal rights to peace, a decent living standard, free health care, free education and happiness.  

Please watch : 
The Empathic Civilisation - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l7AWnfFRc7g

I wish I could do so much more ... but sincerely hope my small contribution really makes a difference   :)
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non for profit, scoping opportunities in new viable ventures and implementing new projects.

lenders.name: Glenda
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a better world. And I want to be apart of it!
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to teach English. I love being a teacher. To see the children learn what I have teached them makes my life and career a dream came true.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: it reinforces the belief that a little bit of goodwill can impact another's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist technology entrepreneurs to develop a plan, start and grow their business.  I then help them to find capital to execute that plan.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because:
1) Life is what you make it
2) Everyone deserves a chance
3) To give hope
lenders.occupational_info: "I know in my heart that man is good. That what is right will always eventually triumph. And there's purpose and worth to each and every life." -Ronald Reagan

lenders.name: debbie
lenders.loan_because: I would like to see social and economic justice for everyone. Also my 5th and 6 th grade students are helping with the loan.

lenders.name: ege
lenders.loan_because: "We will have to repent in this generation not merely for the hateful words and actions of the bad people but for the appalling silence of the good people." — Martin Luther King, Jr.

lenders.name: Denise's Pebbles
lenders.loan_because: to help make a difference in some way
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a flower shop and design arrangements for all occasions & process flowers

lenders.name: Fred
lenders.loan_because: I have done well for myself, and like to help others work their way up too.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer programs for the big IBM computers that corporations use.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I want to feel connected in a positive, meaningful way to people in other parts of the world.  Also, to learn. To remind myself.  To celebrate striving & achievement.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people dream up & build things for the Web.

lenders.name: Sunny
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a hand sometimes, this is a great way for people to help themselves ultimately and not feel they are receiving charity, just a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell software to large companies for as much as I can! I have four kids of various ages who keep me and my wife very busy. My parents were immigrants to the UK, with very little when they arrived. They were shown much hospitality and given help, and this is a way for me to give back in their memory too.
